title: Complete project documentation
description: Write and organize all the documentation for the current project.

title: Update team on progress
description: Send an email update to the team about the current status of the project.

title: Fix login page issue
description: Resolve the bug causing the login page to crash on invalid inputs.

title: Review PRs
description: Check and review all the pending pull requests in the repository.

title: Schedule team meeting
description: Plan and schedule a team meeting to discuss next steps.

title: Optimize database queries
description: Improve the performance of slow database queries.
